Rockville.Norwood School (Montgomery County, Maryl:
Norwood School is an independent co-educational day school in Bethesda, Maryland for students in Pre-kindergarten through eighth grade from 49 zip codes in Maryland, Virginia, and Washington, D.C. Norwood was founded in 1952. The current head of school is Matthew A. Gould.
The school is located within the Potomac census-designated place, and it has a "Bethesda, Maryland" mailing address.
